songs.title: Heart’s on Fire
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh, my heart's on fire
Ooh, on fire

[Verse 1]
I saw you foxy boy, walking through the joint
Had something dangerous about ya' that I tried to ignore
Got my tongue tied, starstruck, biting my nails
I knew right then and there I got to get you all to myself

[Pre-Chorus]
Now I know, I know, I know, I know
I should know better, I should know better
But you know, you know, you know, you know
Can't say "no" ever, can't say "no" ever

[Chorus]
Oh, my heart's on fire, oh, my heart's on fire
My heart's on fire, oh, my heart's on fire
Now the devil's in my head when you're in my bed
Now I'm on fire (Heart's on fire, heart's on fire)

[Verse 2]
Look at all the damage that you've already done
Got me singing the blues and acting foolish when you are gone
Psychotic, neurotic, boy, I'm crazy as hell
Now, how'd you do it? It's like I'm drugged and tied up under your spell

[Pre-Chorus]
Now I know, I know, I know, I know
I should know better, I should know better
But you know, you know, you know, you know
Can't say "no" ever, can't so "no" ever

[Chorus]
Oh, my heart's on fire, oh, my heart's on fire
My heart's on fire, oh, my heart's on fire
Now the devil's in my head when you're in my bed
Now I'm on fire (Heart's on fire, heart's on fire)

[Verse 3]
I want you take me, you break me down
Let's get away from the lights of this lazy town
'Cause I'm sick of all the talk that forgets a soul
Don't wanna roll down this road on cruise control
Now keep playing that shitty little blues guitar
Play it for me, boy, play it for me all night long
'Cause I could just lay and listen 'til the day I die
'Cause I live for the way you set my heart on fire

[Breakdown]
Keep playing that shitty little blues guitar
Boy, play it for me all night long
Keep playing that shitty little blues guitar
Boy, play it for me all night long
Keep playing that shitty little blues guitar
Boy, play it for me all night long
Keep playing that shitty little blues guitar
Keep playing that shitty little blues guitar

[Chorus]
Now the devil's in my head when you're in my bed
My heart's on fire, oh my heart's on fire
My heart's on fire, oh my heart's on fire
Now the devil's in my head when you're in my bed
Now I'm on fire (Heart's on fire, heart's on fire)

[Outro]
Ooh, my heart's on fire
Heart's on fire, ooh, my heart's on fire
